duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate a school bus over designated routes and ensure safe transportation for students to and from school, special events, and field trips.
Perform daily inspections and operator maintenance of the bus to ensure safe and efficient operation.
Maintain order and discipline among students on the bus following District policies and procedures.
Assist in the loading and unloading of physically and mentally handicapped students as necessary.
Maintain records concerning vehicle maintenance, miles driven, number of children transported, and prepare reports as required.
Attend safety and preventive emergency meetings when required and perform first aid according to established guidelines and procedures.
Practice positive interpersonal skills, recognize equipment malfunctions, and observe legal and defensive driving practices.
Implement and adhere to all rules and regulations, policies, administrative guidelines, and directives as adopted by the Board of Education and other authorities.
Maintain acceptable personal attendance and act as a consistent positive public relations agent for the school and district programs.
Perform any other duties that may be assigned by the Director of Transportation or Administrative Staff.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, G.E.D. Certificate, and one year experience in the operation of a motor vehicle. Valid Kentucky Commercial Class B driver's license and School Bus Certificate as required by Kentucky law.
